content.question: The function <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="k open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 2 sin theta"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></math>. What are all values of <math alttext="theta"><mi>θ</mi></math>, for <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less than 2 pi"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math>, where <math alttext="k open parentheses theta close parentheses equals negative 1"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="theta equals pi over 6"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="theta equals pi over 3"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="theta equals fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
